info.+content: Tenma Matsukaze, a first year who loves soccer, has exceptional dribbling skills, but still has lots of room for improvement. He enters Raimon Jr. High ten years after the first Football Frontier International, where Raimon has become famous for its soccer team. However, an organization called Fifth Sector has taken control of soccer over the years, and the passion that Raimon once had for soccer is no longer there.
#2: "Naseba Naru no sa Nanairo Tamago" by T-Pistonz+KMC (eps 19-33)
#1: "Yappa Seishun" by Sorano Aoi CV: Kitahara Sayaka (eps 1-18)
#2: "Kanari Junjou" by Sorano Aoi CV: Kitahara Sayaka (eps 19-33)
#3: "HAJIKE-YO!!" by Sorano Aoi CV: Kitahara Sayaka (eps 34-45)
